entity.publicInfo:
id,
title,
description,
type,
status,
salesEnabled,
link,
date{list of event dates},
planner{default set Planner},
addedBy{default set User},
category{list of Tags},
venue{full set Venue},
rsvp{list of, at maximum 5 Users in Ingresse’s list},
ticket{list of tickets},
aiddp,
formalName,
cnpj,
cpf,
cityNumber
entity.properties: id, title, description (200 chars), date, type, link, venue

methods.name: GET - List of events
methods.action: List all events ordered by date from past to future
methods.partParams:
lat(none): requires long (higher priority than the state*)
long(none): requires lat (higher priority than the state*)
from(present date)
to(none)
state(none): valid state code. Ex.: am for "Amazonas"
term(none): text to be used to search for tags, titles, description, link encoded in URI format - see RFC-3986.
venues names [future version]

examples.label: /event/?term=Migration%20Party&state=sp
examples.description: Brings all events who has term words in any context and are in São Paulo.

examples.label: /event/?long=32.22763&lat=3.76762
examples.description: Brings all events until 400km from the given latitude and longitude

examples.label: /event/?from=2012-11-23&to=2012-11-25
examples.description: Brings all events happening from 23 to 25 November in 2012.

examples.label: /event/?fields=id,title,venue
examples.description: Brings all events from today, but only id, title and venue information.

methods.name: GET - Retrieve an specific event
methods.action: Brings full set of specific information for the given id event

examples.label: /event/963
examples.description: Brings full set of information for specified event.

examples.label: /event/963?fields=id,title,venue
examples.description: Bring full set of information for specified event, but only id, title and venue information.

methods.name: GET - Retrive Ingresse list of a specific event
methods.action: List of users in Ingresse list for specified event with default set of information in a random order.

examples.label: /event/963/rsvp/
examples.description: List users in Ingresse list for specified event.

methods.name: GET - Retrieve event's tickets list
methods.action: List of tickets for specified event with full set of information.

examples.label: /event/963/tickets/
examples.description: List of tickets for specified event with full set of information.

methods.name: GET - Retrieve event's poster
methods.action: Return event poster in the specified parameters
methods.partParams:
width (none): width in pixels. Requires height to be specified.
height (none): width in pixels. Requires width to be specified.
size(normal): options are (small[70x90],normal[230x300],big[460x600])

examples.label: /event/963/poster
examples.description: Brings event poster in default size.

examples.label: /event/963/poster/?size="normal"
examples.description: Brings event poster in normal size.
